sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import products from '../products_' const ProductDetails = () => { const{id}= useParams() const product = products.find((p) => p._id === id) return ( <> Go Back {product.name} {product.description} {product.brand} {product.category} {product.price} Price: {product.price} Dh Status: {(product.countInStock > 0) ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} Quantit√©: {product.countInStock} ) } export default ProductDetails
